email.subject: Discovering password of mobile phone
email.body:
Hey #PLAYERNAME#. Before starting, I just wanted to make some challenges for you. I'll leave the IP for you to connect and discover an exploit and have it converted to hexadecimal. Please send it to me. The exploit is a binary code that contains the mobile phone password.
Thanks,
- TSK

attachments.note: Go to the https://github.com/tanjilk/HackShield/tree/decoder and run the python3 script to decode the binary code to hex
